# Luka Minđek - AI Engineer

> AI engineer from Varaždin, Croatia, specializing in NLP, Computer Vision, agentic systems, and custom AI models. 8+ years of experience designing, training, and deploying AI systems across CPUs, GPUs, and TPUs.

## About

Luka Minđek is the Founder & CEO of MindX (mindx.global), an AI engineering consultancy. He builds smart, scalable AI solutions for real-world applications using PyTorch, TensorFlow, and Hugging Face.

## Expertise

- Natural Language Processing (NLP): Document summarization, sentiment analysis, chatbots, data extraction, multi-language translation
- Computer Vision: Image classification, object detection, identity verification, video analysis, OCR
- Agentic Systems: Custom AI agents, LLM-powered workflows, autonomous processing
- Custom AI Models: Training and fine-tuning models with 95%+ accuracy

## Case Studies

### Segwitz - Computer Vision Quality Control
85% reduction in manual QA process, saving 120+ hours monthly. Accuracy improved from 72% to 98.5%.
Technologies: Python, PyTorch, Computer Vision, OpenCV

### Seven Sigma Group - NLP Pipeline
Comprehensive NLP pipeline delivered 2 weeks ahead of schedule.
Technologies: Python, NLP, Hugging Face, FastAPI

### TextValue - Sentiment Analysis
Automated processing of 10,000+ customer reviews. Analysis time reduced from 3 days to 5 minutes with 94% accuracy.
Technologies: Python, NLP, TensorFlow, REST API

### Magic Net - Contract Processing
Contract generation reduced from 45 minutes to under 2 minutes. 3,000+ contracts processed with zero errors.
Technologies: Python, NLP, LLMs, Document AI

### Anehi - Medical Image Analysis
Patient image analysis in 8 seconds with 96% diagnostic accuracy. Patient satisfaction increased by 40%.
Technologies: Python, PyTorch, Medical Imaging, Computer Vision

### Meta BaZi - AI-Powered Web Application
Chinese astrology web app with AI integration, user accounts, chatbots, and custom prompts. Delivered in 5-6 weeks.
Technologies: Next.js, React, Node.js, OpenAI API

## Stats

- 50+ projects delivered
- 30+ ML models with 95%+ accuracy
- 50+ production applications
- 100% client satisfaction rate
- 5.0/5 overall rating
